short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces your browser's new page and home page which presents your links as a clean, simple list

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embrace a visually pleasing and convenient new tab replacement with "A New HOMEpage." Create a personalized list of links, grouped and sorted to match your unique interests and preferences. The minimal, typographic design ensures it stays unobtrusive and visually appealing, letting you focus solely on getting where you want to go quickly and efficiently.

Its features include:
- create bookmark lists in 4 simple columns
- editing and deleting links
- import/export bookmarks
- changing the order of links and lists by dragging & dropping
- ability to change color theme and create your own
- list folding function to hide links inside
